identity.title: Converting the Letter Grade of a Student to Its Numeric Range

content.prompt:
Construct a program that receives a grade from the user and prints the numeric range for that grade using the following grading rules:
A for scores ≥ 90
B for scores ≥ 80
C for scores ≥ 70
D for scores ≥ 60
F for scores < 60
For example, if the user enters the grade D, the program prints "Score is in range [60-70)".
